publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2681 Patrick Harvie: Future of Glasgow Homeopathic Hospital In-patient Ward—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow Homeopathic Hospital Campaign Team for its tireless efforts to prevent the closure of the in-patient ward at Glasgow Homoeopathic Hospital; commends the team on its dedication and commitment over the past 12 months; notes that NHS Greater Glasgow Heath Board’s corporate management team is meeting on 12 April 2005 to decide if it should abandon the proposals to the close the in-patient ward, further notes that politicians from every party have expressed their support for the retention of the in-patient ward, and urges NHS Greater Glasgow’s corporate management team to drop the proposal to close what is acknowledged to be a world-class facility with a pioneering model of integrative care.

S2M-2681 Future of Glasgow Homeopathic Hospital In-patient Ward (lodged on 8 April 2005) Chris Ballance*, Bruce Crawford*, Frances Curran*, Christine Grahame*, Nora Radcliffe*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Bill Aitken*
